description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 4 (Materials), 5i (a - c) (Contamination),  of planning permission ref. 2391/APP/2024/563, dated 23/05/2024 (Erection of a two storey extension and a three storey extension to existing self-storage unit (Use Class B8) with associated works to the existing building including new roof, amendments to fenestration and external materials.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The Applicant is advised that this application relates to details pursuant to the partial discharge only of condition 5. Specifically this decision notice discharges parts 5i (a to c) attached to planning permission ref. 2391/APP/2024/563. Further details related to the remaining outstanding parts of condition 5(ii - iv) are required in order to fully discharge the condition.
